name: mosaic medley pot holder
notes:
the mosaic medley pot holder is a free crochet pattern on my blog.

this beautifully textured, double-thick hot pad is worked as a square from the center out in rounds. an easy two-round repeat that provides lovely texture and color work.

complete photo and video tutorial for both the stitch as well as how to fold and seam your finished square to create a double thick hot pad.

very easy!
